item.title: Prayer Plan
item.description: I use it as a system for guiding my prayer life and I hope you find it helpful. Feel free to tweak and modify it as you see fit. Basics There are two basic parts of this system: Requests Bible passages The idea is that you split up your requests over a week and will have a specific Bible passage to guide your prayer each week. For example, let’s say you have a friend named Martha and you want to pray for her.

item.title: Practical Spiritual Disciplines: Prayer
item.description: This is part of a series called Practical Spiritual Disciplines in which I will be discussing how to practice the spiritual disciplines. The Questions We all know prayer is important. Prayer is one of the most common topics throughout the Bible and Jesus Himself consistently made time out of His busy and effective ministry to pray (see Luke 5:16, 6:12, 9:28, 11:1, and 22:41 as some examples). If you think you are too busy or don’t need prayer, take a look at Jesus’ life and think again.
